name: High-intensity statins
title: Prescribing of high-intensity statins
as a percentage of prescribing of all statins
description: as a percentage of items of all statins.
numerator_where: (bnf_code like '0212000Y0%AH' or bnf_code like '0212000B0%AB' or bnf_code like '0212000B0%AN'
or bnf_code like '0212000B0%AC or bnf_code like '0212000B0%AP' or bnf_code like '0212000B0%AD'
or bnf_code like '0212000AA%AA' or or bnf_code like '0212000AA%AB' or or bnf_code like '0212000AA%AC')
denominator_where: (bnf_code like '0212000AA%' or bnf_code like '0212000AC%' or bnf_code like '0212000B0%'
or bnf_code like '0212000C0%' or bnf_code like '0212000M0% or bnf_code like '0212000X0%'
